summary: This is an email exchange between two individuals discussing the need for a recent monthly report on criminal charging statistics, specifically for a call with probation and pretrial services. The sender provides an attachment of a report dated December 2020.

persons.name: Motia
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email in the chain, referencing a quarterly report sent on January 18, 2021.

events.title: Quarterly Report Sent
events.description: A quarterly report on criminal charging statistics was sent by Motia.

events.title: Call with Probation and Pretrial
events.description: A scheduled call with probation and pretrial services requiring the most recent monthly report on new charges/defendants.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated February 22, 2021, concerning criminal charging statistics.
The correspondence is related to preparing for a call with probation and pretrial services.
An attached report filename suggests it contains data from December 2020 ('2020.12_Crim.Monthly_Charging_Summary_5.0.pdf').
The email indicates a routine administrative task within a legal or law enforcement context, not directly referencing Epstein, victims, or associates.
Only one individual, 'Motia', is named in the provided text fragment.
